hero.title: Grow Better Together
hero.subtitle: Discover the perfect plant companions for your garden with our AI-powered crop association assistant.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Our AI-powered app helps you create the perfect garden by suggesting companion plants that grow well together.

step1.title: 1. Select Your Crops
step1.description: Choose the plants you want to grow in your garden.

step2.title: 2. Get AI Recommendations
step2.description: Our AI suggests the best companion plants based on scientific data.

step3.title: 3. Plan Your Garden
step3.description: Arrange your plants optimally using our interactive garden planner.

cropAssistant.title: Crop Assistant
cropAssistant.description: Ask me about which plants grow well together
cropAssistant.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your crop association assistant. What plants are you growing or planning to grow?
cropAssistant.tomatoResponse: Tomatoes grow well with basil, onions, carrots, and garlic. Avoid planting them near potatoes, fennel, or cabbage.
cropAssistant.lettuceResponse: Lettuce benefits from being near carrots, radishes, cucumbers, and strawberries. Keep it away from sunflowers.
cropAssistant.carrotResponse: Carrots grow well with tomatoes, onions, leeks, and rosemary. Avoid planting them near dill.
cropAssistant.defaultResponse: To give you specific recommendations, I need to know which crop you're interested in. Could you mention a specific plant like tomato, lettuce, or carrot?

tomato.name: Tomato
tomato.benefits: Basil improves flavor and repels insects. Onions and garlic prevent pests.

lettuce.name: Lettuce
lettuce.benefits: Grows well with root plants that don't compete for nutrients in the same soil layer.

carrot.name: Carrot
carrot.benefits: Tomatoes release solanine which protects carrots from pests. Rosemary repels carrot fly.

gardenPlanner.title: Interactive Garden Planner
gardenPlanner.subtitle: Design your garden layout by dragging and dropping plants
gardenPlanner.noGarden: No garden created yet. Create a new garden to start planning!

calendar.title: Planting Calendar
calendar.subtitle: Find the best times to plant based on your location
calendar.customizeCalendar: Customize calendar for your specific needs
calendar.hardinessExplanation: Hardiness zones are geographical areas defined by the minimum temperatures that plants can survive in.

growthTracker.title: Growth Tracker
growthTracker.subtitle: Track the progress of your plants over time
growthTracker.noPlants: No plants added yet. Add your first plant to start tracking!

aiInfo.title: Vercel AI SDK Information
aiInfo.description: Information about costs and usage of Vercel AI SDK
aiInfo.sdkInfo: The Vercel AI SDK is a free tool that simplifies integrating AI models into web applications.
aiInfo.sdkCost: The SDK itself is free and open source.
aiInfo.modelCost: AI models like GPT-4 have costs associated with the provider (OpenAI).
